ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: 55 Songs
ygData.msgSnippet: Different instruments don t affect songs differently, except for the % increase they provide.  You re not going to find one awesome string instrument that does
ygData.messageBody:
Different instruments don't affect songs differently, except for the % increase they provide. You're not going to find one awesome string instrument that does affect the mana regen portion of Cantana where others do not. You can simply take a store bought lute, test for any increases and adjust that for all instruments with higher bonuses. There's no secrets or surprises here.

Darkfox
Xegony



Ah, ok. Erp, how do we know it does not increase mana regen though? I've seen tests about the songs before, and how they stack, but I don't recall seeing whether a different stringed instrument would afftect the song differently.
----- Original Message -----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Sent: Saturday, May 05, 2001 11:07 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: 55 Songs


I know it is less than Kelin's, so maybe 25% bonus give or take?

Shada

> Gaelthorne (who still has not run numbers on the Lute of the Howler)
> Xegony
